thread.title: Today at the Chicago International Film Festival: ‘We Monsters’
thread.title_full: Today at the Chicago International Film Festival: ‘We Monsters’

author: Bill Stamets
title: Today at the Chicago International Film Festival: ‘We Monsters’
text: Bill Stamets on October 19, 2015 "We Monsters" The Chicago International Film Festival continues through Oct. 29 at AMC River East 21, 322 E. Illlinois. “WE MONSTERS ” (Germany): An outburst by a friend’s 13-year-old daughter, says director-writer Sebastian Ko, made him think about “unpredictable teenagers.” How might divorced parents deal with their daughter telling them she killed a girl? Like a few other fest entries — spoiler alert — this crafty drama veers at the very last minute into dark comedy. The take-away from this tense affair: A family under threat can really reconnect. Homicide is a cure-all. 12:30 p.m. Monday.
